alert.note: Alert for Larue; Marion; Nelson; Washington (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN NELSON...EASTERN LARUE...NORTHWESTERN MARION AND SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Lebanon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Springfield, Loretto, Raywick, Saint Francis, Burkes Spring, Gethsemane, Belltown, Dant and Nerinx. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Kentucky.
